QuestData.Title: The Thane of Voldrune
QuestData.Description: With the flame-imbued talismans, we can finally challenge the thane.$B$BHis favorite mount is a ferocious proto-drake called Flamebringer. It is kept bound in chains in the western part of Voldrune, but with the power of the talismans, you should be able to bend it to your will and use it against the thane.$B$BOnce you have Flamebringer under your control, search the tops of the towers of Voldrune for the thane and use Flamebringer to destroy him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Flamebringer to defeat Thane Torvald Eriksson and report to Sergeant Nazgrim at Conquest Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: The few remaining Dragonflayers dare not challenge us after your battle with the thane. Show no mercy to our enemies - that is the way of the Horde.
